title: Sunny 1 bed apt in Fenway Brownstone*HEAT & HW Inc* near Northeastern
posting_body: ['This sunny 1 bedroom/1 bath apartment in Fenway is located in a Brownstone and has Bay windows facing the front of the building.', 'Located in a central location for many lines of public transportation including the Green B, C, & D lines, and for buses- the 55, 8, 47, & 57 as well as the Worcester commuter rail.', 'The bedroom is on the smaller side, but the living area is large.', 'HEAT & HOT WATER is included in the rent!', 'With hardwood floors, high ceilings, and a decorative fireplace, this modern unit is fresh on the market and not to be missed!', 'Laundry in the building.', 'On street parking with permit.', "Contact me for this one before it's snatched quickly.", 'Listing: https://ygl.is/2vkf/211167036', 'PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 211167036', 'Rent: $2,650 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Modern,Laundry In Building,Hardwood,Bay Windows,', 'FEATURES', 'Bay Windows', 'Decorative Fire Place', 'Dishwasher', 'Free On Street Parking - No Permit', 'Free On Street Parking with Permit', 'Hardwood', 'Heat and Hot Water Included', 'Laundry In Building', 'Modern', 'Modern Kitchen', 'Sunny']
